getTank

public fueltank.FuelTank getTank()
In order to give access to fueltank accessor methods but not access to change the values of the tank of the car

Returns:
a copy of the fuel tank

travel

public double travel(double km)
how much fuel do you need to fill into the tank of the car to travel a given number of kilometres,
  • if the tank capacity is smaller than the fuel needed, the amount is given to fill it up full
  • if the tank has more than needed, zero is returned

    Parameters:
    km - number of kilometres to travel
    Returns:
    the number of litres to fill the tank up with
